content:
The Jan. 6 attack is something that still affects members of Congress and staff today. From death threats to verbal abuse, members of Congress and public servants should not have to fear for their lives on a daily basis. 
pbs.org/newshour/polit…
name: Raja Krishnamoorthi
text: jan attack something still affects members congress staff today death threats verbal abuse members congress public servants fear lives daily basis pbsorgnewshourpolit

content:
HAPPENING NOW: I’m joining Congresswoman Pramila Jayapal & Poor People's Campaign: A National Call for Moral Revival to introduce our resolution to dismantle structural inequality & end poverty.

Poor People's Campaign: A National Call for Moral Revival was live.
9 hrs ·

JOIN Poor People’s Campaign co-chairs Rev. Dr. William J. Barber, II & Rev. Dr. Liz Theoharis along with U.S. Rep. Barbara Lee of California, co-chair, Majority Leader’s Task Force on Poverty and Opportunity, and U.S. Rep. Pramila Jayapal of Washington state, chair of the Congressional Progressive Caucus, for the launch of the Third Reconstruction Resolution to the nation!

***To see StreamText captions: www.bit.ly/PPC_2021
name: Barbara Lee

content:
Don't miss this important discussion beginning at 9AM!

This year's program will focus on the aerospace and defense industry and highlight opportunities for small and medium-sized manufacturing firms based in western Massachusetts to partner with large companies such as Raytheon Technologies and General Dynamics in order to expand their relationships within the aerospace and defense sectors.

https://innovation.masstech.org/calendar/event/42876

content:
Up this week:
SUBCOMMITTEE ON INVESTIGATIONS AND OVERSIGHT & SUBCOMMITTEE ON RESEARCH AND TECHNOLOGY HEARING
Subject: “SolarWinds and Beyond: Improving the Cybersecurity of Software Supply Chains”
DATE: Tuesday, May 25, 2021
TIME: 2:00 p.m. EDT
Witnesses:
• Mr. Matthew Scholl, Chief, Computer Security Division of the Information Technology Laboratory, National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST)
• Dr. Trey Herr, Director, Cyber Statecraft Initiative, Atlantic Council
• Katie Moussouris, Founder and CEO, Luta Security
• Mr. Vijay D’Souza, Director, Information Technology and Cybersecurity, Government Accountability Office (GAO)
name: House Science, Space, & Technology Committee
text: weeksubcommittee investigations oversight subcommittee research technology hearingsubject solarwinds beyond improving cybersecurity software supply chainsdate tuesday may 2021time pm edtwitnesses mr matthew scholl chief computer security division information technology laboratory national institute standards technology nist dr trey herr director cyber statecraft initiative atlantic council katie moussouris founder ceo luta security mr vijay dsouza director information technology cybersecurity government accountability office gao
